meaning: departure, discharge, publish, emit, start from, disclose, counter for gunshots

onyomiExamples.meaning: departure, departing (from ...), departing (at time ...), sending, sent (by ...), sent (at ...), engine, counter for gunshots, bursts of gas, etc., counter for bullets, bombs, etc., counter for blows (punches)
green dragon tile, winning hand with a pung (or kong) of green dragon tiles
generation of heat, (attack of) fever, pyrexia

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to stand, to rise, to stand up, to find oneself (e.g. in a difficult position), to depart (on a plane, train, etc.)
to disclose, to divulge, to expose, to open (and rob) a grave
